loreFragments.title: The Silent Accord
loreFragments.text: When the Quantum Architects and The Splices formed their unexpected alliance, not a word was spoken. Code fragments exchanged in silence across the digital void served as the only testament to their agreement. This 'Silent Accord,' as it came to be known, would later prove crucial during the Protocol Wars.
loreFragments.discoveryCondition: Analyze 100+ transactions on all three supported chains
